nodes.text: Dor Namethians were a sentient species that lived in the galaxy. Lexo Sooger, who worked as a masseur was a member of this species.

The Dor Namethians were a species of blue or gray colored skin. They could release pheromones at will which had a powerful influence on others, though overuse of the ability could result in exhaustion. They also possessed a very strong sense of smell.
During the Imperial Era, a Dor Namethian was present when Vullen Candroon chased Chewbacca on Marquinn.
Lexo Sooger, a male Dor Namethian, was the star masseur at Zord's Spa and Bathhouse in Canto Bight.
